column4: I'm new to Linux :D! can anybody tell me how to use an installed program..is "macchanger" ...is instalet somewhere in Linux ..I can acces it through the terminal but I cannot figure it out how to change my MAC... it says to write something like: macchanger -m eth0 "-- MAC:00:00:00:00:00:00" ...the part after eth0 doesn't work...I think I have to write it different

I'm new to Linux ! can anybody tell me how to use an installed program..is "macchanger" ...is instalet somewhere in Linux ..I can acces it through the terminal but I cannot figure it out how to change my MAC... it says to write something like: macchanger -m eth0 "-- MAC:00:00:00:00:00:00" ...the part after eth0 doesn't work...I think I have to write it different
you would need to install macchanger-gtk
please give more info about the model of modem
if someone knows they will respond; no need to repost every two minutes
which version of the huawei? the 169?
it does matter for troubleshooting purposes
you need to provide the model number so we can search ubuntuforums and the like for a fix
please dont PM; keep it in channel; I have provided you a link above on how to get it working-->please avail yourself of the opportunity to read it.
please read the link I gave you.
understood; have you actually read the link we provided?
please read the link provided; chat in #ubuntu-offtopic NOT here
thats not important; this is ubuntu not windows
stay on topic or you will be removed
